attributes.action: Tell us how much of our foreign aid budget China will be given to fund its launch of a rocket to the moon.
attributes.additional_details: It is simply not believable that the country with the biggest international loan budget deficit on the planet, outside of the North American Continent, can be giving taxpayers money away to another country, as foreign aid, while that country is driving the industrial growth and precipitating the rising cost of raw materials of the planet AND is about to launch a rocket to put a man on the moon.  I just hope that MPs have got a few quid put away for their future, because SOMEBODY is going to HAVE TO DO SOMETHING PDQ to change the way we treat our taxpayers, and the first thing that must be done is to dispose of the 650 or so dishonourables who have CONTINUOUSLY demonstrated that they have ABSOLUTELY no interest in the well-being or welfare of the people of this country.
